author: Lon.TV
description:
Find HDRetrovision Cables on Stoneage Gamer - https://lon.tv/qrux5 & Amazon : https://lon.tv/e4lbj (compensated affiliate links). The tariffs we talked about on Monday are impacting manufacturers in the retro gaming community. In this video I speak with Nick Mueller from @HDRetrovision about the impact 145% tariffs have on his company. See my previous video : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X1mH9ua2OG0 and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

09:03 - Why not make them in the USA?
13:24 - What goes into making an HDRetrovision Cable?
16:20 - Competitive Pressures?
18:20 - Inequities in Tariff Impact
19:42 - Is this the end for HDRetrovision?
22:21 - Comparison to COVID Challenges
24:25 - Interview Conclusion
